name: SatelliteInfection
description:
In a world where mankind has perished, he alone cleans the universe by removing garbage (broken satellites).
It is a growth type shooting game set in space.
Combine many enhancements to create your own spaceship.
It is also possible to challenge the highest record in infinite mode or survive for a limited time in story mode.
In the future, new enhancement parts will be released through continuous updates.
